tests.name: Should fail on outer-join
statements: CREATE STREAM test_stream (id1 BIGINT KEY, f1 BIGINT) WITH (kafka_topic='left_topic', format='JSON');
CREATE TABLE test_table (id2 BIGINT PRIMARY KEY, f2 BIGINT) WITH (kafka_topic='right_topic', format='JSON');
CREATE STREAM output AS SELECT id1, id2, f1, f2 FROM test_stream FULL OUTER JOIN test_table ON id1 = id2;

expectedException.message: Invalid join type: full-outer join not supported for stream-table joins.

tests.name: Should fail on incorrect join order for inner-join
statements: CREATE TABLE test_table (id1 BIGINT PRIMARY KEY, f1 BIGINT) WITH (kafka_topic='left_topic', format='JSON');
CREATE STREAM test_stream (id2 BIGINT KEY, f2 BIGINT) WITH (kafka_topic='right_topic', format='JSON');
CREATE TABLE output AS SELECT id1, id2, f1, f2 FROM test_table JOIN test_stream ON id1 = id2;

expectedException.message: Invalid join order: table-stream joins are not supported; only stream-table joins.

tests.name: Should fail on incorrect join order for left-join
statements: CREATE TABLE test_table (id1 BIGINT PRIMARY KEY, f1 BIGINT) WITH (kafka_topic='left_topic', format='JSON');
CREATE STREAM test_stream (id2 BIGINT KEY, f2 BIGINT) WITH (kafka_topic='right_topic', format='JSON');
CREATE TABLE output AS SELECT id1, id2, f1, f2 FROM test_table LEFT JOIN test_stream ON id1 = id2;

expectedException.message: Invalid join order: table-stream joins are not supported; only stream-table joins.

tests.name: Should fail on table-side non-key join attribute for inner-join
statements: CREATE STREAM test_stream (id1 BIGINT KEY, f1 BIGINT) WITH (kafka_topic='left_topic', format='JSON');
CREATE TABLE test_table (id2 BIGINT PRIMARY KEY, f2 BIGINT) WITH (kafka_topic='right_topic', format='JSON');
CREATE STREAM output AS SELECT id1, id2, f1, f2 FROM test_stream JOIN test_table ON id1 = f2;

expectedException.message: Invalid join condition: stream-table joins require to join on the table's primary key

tests.name: Should fail on table-side non-key join attribute for left-join
statements: CREATE STREAM test_stream (id1 BIGINT KEY, f1 BIGINT) WITH (kafka_topic='left_topic', format='JSON');
CREATE TABLE test_table (id2 BIGINT PRIMARY KEY, f2 BIGINT) WITH (kafka_topic='right_topic', format='JSON');
CREATE STREAM output AS SELECT id1, id2, f1, f2 FROM test_stream LEFT JOIN test_table ON id1 = f2;

expectedException.message: Invalid join condition: stream-table joins require to join on the table's primary key
